Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ptahpanefer with painted details: a black lappet-wig, a modelled face with black eyes and mouth, crossed arms in low relief holding two black hoes, the front of the legs is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs within a border, the back is decorated with a representation of a black seed-basket and a yoke with two pendular nu-pots.
